content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking in my spare time. It's a great way to get outside and get some exercise.
That's awesome! I like to hike too. Where do you like to hike?
I usually hike in the Appalachian Mountains. There are a lot of great trails there.
I've never been to the Appalachian Mountains, but I've heard great things about them.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful place.
I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit.
What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I love shopping for fashion and clothes. I'm going to be a freshman at Auburn University next year, and I'm really excited to start shopping for new clothes.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun shopping for clothes at Auburn. It's a great place to find stylish clothes.
I know! I'm so excited to start my new life there.
I'm sure you'll do great things. You seem like a very driven person.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a doctor. I've always been fascinated by the human body and I want to help people.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be an amazing doctor.
Thanks! I'm working hard to make it happen.
I know you will. You seem like a very determined person.
